attributes.action: CHANGE THE SYSTEM ON BORDER CONTROL SO WE KNOW HOW MANY ARE IN THE COUNTRY.
attributes.additional_details: WE THE UNDERSIGNED WANT TO SEE `WASTE` CUT OUT AND A PROPER SYSTEM WHERE THE COUNTRY KNOWS HOW MANY PEOPLE ARE IN IT FROM ABROAD, WHO SHOULD HAVE LEFT, CRIMINALS STOPPED FROM ENTRY, CHANGES IN HUMAN RIGHTS SO CRIMINALS AND PEOPLE WHO BREAK OUR LAWS ARE REMOVED VERY QUICK BACK TO THERE OWN COUNTRY AND REFUSED ENTRY BACK HERE, IT IS A WASTE OF PUBLIC FUNDS TAKING THEM TO COURT AND GIVEN BAIL AND THEN THEY DISAPPEAR AGAIN, WE ARE A SOFT TOUCH FOR MANY PEOPLE TO JUMP ONTO OUR BENEFITS AT OUR COST, ALSO THE WASTE IN A £188,000,000 COMPUTER SYSTEM WHICH DOES NOT WORK AS IT SHOULD.
